text: Egh uaghan ia arazir kuraba gɨn amadir ofa bagh, memen apurir vamɨra inigh ofa damu, eghtɨ arazir kamɨn Ikiavɨra Itir God gumazamizibar amutɨ, me an damazimɨn zuegham. Memen kam gisɨn, ofan igharazir ia zurara amiba uaghan da inigh ofa damu. Kar, ofan bar isia mɨghɨrim, ko an wit tuamin ofa, ko an wainɨn dɨpabar ofa, ia ofan kabar amu.”
